items.comment: word wrap
items.msg: word wrap

items.comment:
handle SIGHUP as a restart properly

now it interrupts child tasks, which isn't good, but can be improved
items.msg: handle SIGHUP as a restart properly

items.comment: wait for the child tasks before restarting after signal
items.msg: wait for the child tasks before restarting after signal

items.comment: handle the case where ENV is not set
items.msg: handle the case where ENV is not set

items.comment:
simplify signal handling code

we do not need to fork, as we do not need the PID to wait for it,
thanks to pcntl_wait().
items.msg: simplify signal handling code

items.comment: make init script executable
items.msg: make init script executable

items.comment: remove unused variable
items.msg: remove unused variable

items.comment: handle stopping gracefully, by waiting for our poor children
items.msg: handle stopping gracefully, by waiting for our poor children

items.comment: better log messages for signals
items.msg: better log messages for signals

items.comment: use unset instead of assigning to null to try to free memory
items.msg: use unset instead of assigning to null to try to free memory

items.comment:
load more than one task at a time

this reduces latency (one less sleep(1) call), the number of SQL
requests (one request per N tasks, where N is the default argument of
hosting_get_new_tasks()) and probably use less memory because we don't
do the wider loop all the time

this means, however, we need to check the time in the inner loop too
items.msg: load more than one task at a time

items.comment: Fix up the auto restart functionality and remove forking.
items.msg: Fix up the auto restart functionality and remove forking.

items.comment:
Revert "make delays translatable" format plural is translatable.

This reverts commit 5d13147501a43630f1abb6e2fe87009a67abc919.
items.msg: Revert "make delays translatable" format plural is translatable.

items.comment:
rename the hosting-queue-runner to hosting-queued

a few reasons:

 1. it's shorter
 2. it's really a daemon
 3. it will look better in init.d/
items.msg: rename the hosting-queue-runner to hosting-queued
